reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Revision of the Management and Conservation Plan for the Island of Mozambique (Historic Urban Landscape and World Heritage)

description.narrative: Since the Island of Mozambique was inscribed on the World Heritage List, the Government of Mozambique has tried to reverse the increasing degradation of the island's built heritage and to improve the living conditions of its inhabitants. In 2010, a Conservation and Management Plan (2010-1014) was finalised with the support from different international and approved by the Government of Mozambique. The purpose of the project is to support the formulation of the new management and conservation plan (2018-2022) applying the UNESCO Historic Urban Landscape (HUL) approach while addressing the issues raised by the World Heritage Committee through its Decision 40 COM 7B.15 (May 2016).

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
